quote: How charming is divine Philosophy! Not harsh, and crabbed as dull fools suppose, But musical as is Apollo's lute, And a perpetual feast of nectar'd sweets, Where no crude surfet raigns.
author: John Milton

quote: Plus d'un qui n'a pu liberer ses propres chaines a su pourtant en liberer son ami.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Δύο υπερβολές : ν' αποκλείουμε το Λόγο, και να μη δεχόμαστε παρά μόνο το Λόγο.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: Animals are irrational men
author: Safir Kassim Booudjelal

quote: Il pessimismo radicale sconfina nell'ottimismo.
author: Guido Morselli

quote: Sin is a gravitation.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: You can't always be right, but you can be wrong a lot less
author: Benny Bellamacina

quote: Without causality in the world, there is no point in educating people, or making any moral or political appeal.
author: Felix Alba-Juez
source: The Perception of Time... and its Measurement

quote: #quote In the harshest conditions is when we know better the people around us. En las condiciones más duras es cuando conocemos mejor a las personas que nos rodean.
author: Juan Luis Ortiz Hidalgo
source: Las mil vidas del profesor Bonham

quote: A leap of faith doesn’t involve leg strength. Still, I can’t take any chances, so I’ve been doing squats.
author: Jarod Kintz
source: A Zebra is the Piano of the Animal Kingdom

quote: A man has to have something he can put faith in. Can't you see that? What I want is someone that will love me; she would have me and I her. Otherwise a man may just go hang himself
author: Erich Maria Remarque

quote: How does one kill fear, I wonder? How do you shoot a spectre through the heart, slash off its spectral head, take it by its spectral throat?
author: Joseph Conrad

quote: You deny them hope... You are telling them that Jesus loves them, but not much.
author: Harper Lee

quote: If we make it out of this alive, I’ll kill you. So you have that to look forward to.
author: Jarod Kintz
source: At even one penny, this book would be overpriced. In fact, free is too expensive, because you'd still waste time by reading it.

quote: The chimes were clinging in the wind. Or were they clanging, and clinging to hope?
author: Jarod Kintz
source: Seriously delirious, but not at all serious

quote: Yes, in spite of all, Some shape of beauty moves away the pall From our dark spirits.
author: John Keats

quote: Un atkal krīt zvaigzne un ceļas cerība. Kā bizonis ceļas cerība, kā baldriāns.
author: Imants Ziedonis

quote: Take a chance..., change a 'NO' to a 'YES'today.
author: M. Howson

quote: Have you lost your hope? Have you remained inside the fog? Don’t worry; even if you can’t find it, a new hope will come and find you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Answers based in truth are the foundation of wisdom.
author: Jayce O'Neal

quote: And that's what love is, I suppose. The one thing that is most worth hoping for, and the one thing that's most surprising when it lands. Because it's better. It exceeds hope, makes hope nearsighted.
author: Jessica Soffer

quote: In the middle of the night, there is always less hope; in the dawn of the morning, there is always more hope!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Then every man would be as a god, you see. The result of this, of course, would be that there would no longer be any gods, only men. We would give them knowledge of the sciences and the arts, which we possess, and in so doing we would destroy their simple faith and remove all basis for their hoping that things will be better—for the best way to destroy faith or hope is to let it be realized.
author: Roger Zelazny

quote: ISE LO GUN ISE.
author: RIDWAN AKOTUN

quote: Awak HEBAT! Buktikan & tonjolkan KEHEBATAN Awak .. =)
author: Cikgu Syadida Zakaria (UPSI)

quote: It is through imagination that we transcend understanding and travel into the world of possibilities.
author: Danielle Pierre

quote: Know that true change is demonstrated only by your actions around everyone, not just certain people.
author: Tanya R. Liverman

quote: Why can you see the stars at night, but not the light...
author: A. Witness
source: The Adventures of Zac Master: The Light

quote: decision is of the mind not of the mouth also determination is of the heart not of the head- Golden Life Foundation
author: Chris C. Nwakanma

quote: Love and honor the world around you, and you experience life in its fullest. There is no “Other.” There is simply us. The all of us, the whole of us. The mankind of us. Anything else is a lie.
author: Cassandra Blizzard

quote: Our lives are a flicker of light in the shadowy darkness of eternity. Disease, famine, war, death, sorrow... Life is a cycle of pain, perhaps the one thing we should do with our short lives is to try to leave the world a better place than we entered it?’"~Vexis Zaelwarsh - Low Priestess to Avanti-Deathsworn Arc 4: Rise of the Archmage
author: Martyn Stanley

quote: The cure for anything is salt water - sweat, tears, or the sea.
author: Isak Dinesen

quote: If you can think about it, you can achieve it. The difference between your thought and achievement are your self-doubt, and fear of failure. The longer you will take to start, the longer you will take to reach your destination. Seeds of everything that we see around were first sown in the mind.

quote: Small caterpillars still become big butterflies.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Transcendent, magical romance happens when you’re one hundred percent present for each other as #supersoul lovers.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Niemand kann euch etwas eröffnen, das nicht schon im Dämmern eures Wissens schlummert.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: Dein Wissen hat keine Bedeutung, wenn niemand anderes weiß, dass du weißt.
author: Aulus Persius Flaccus

quote: There is a reason that all things are as they are, and did you see with my eyes and know with my knowledge, you would perhaps better understand.
author: Bram Stoker

quote: Skepsis wirft Fragen auf, die zu Nachforschungen führen. Das ist sehr hilfreich, um neue Dinge zu entwickeln.
author: Dalai Lama XIV

quote: We have not given science too big a place in our education, but we have made a perilous mistake in giving it too great a preponderance in method in every other branch of study.
author: Woodrow Wilson

quote: They don't understand it. They're not old enough to know the first instinct of irritation should be avoided in order to keep an open mind.
author: Amelia Gray

quote: You're never losing when you're learning !
author: Knowledge Notes

quote: Ma már nem gondolom, hogy út, szenvedés, fáradtság nélkül célba lehet jutni.
author: Tolvaly Ferenc

quote: One who has reached a goal no longer travels the road"(Pauline Christianity, p. 111)
author: John Ziesler

quote: Il culmine del piacere è la pura e semplice distruzione del dolore.
author: Epicurus

quote: An ocean of shimmering love exists in your heart. Tap into it today and rest in the undulating currents of the great mystery.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Success is the relentless pursuit of joy.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: If you want to change the world,learn to change yourself first.
author: Hazrat Ali ibn Abu-Talib R.A

quote: Interconnection permeates the entire universe. We are all one.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: When you give your mind, body, and heart the message that you are worth the effort of being conscious, miraculous things start to happen.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree
source: The Spiritual Girl's Guide to Dating: Your Enlightened Path to Love, Sex, & Soul Mates

quote: Thanksgiving is a joyous invitation to shower the world with love and gratitude.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: What are five things you are grateful for? Right now? Open to gratitude and you will soften into joy.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Loving yourself is required for authentic relationships.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree
source: The Spiritual Girl's Guide to Dating: Your Enlightened Path to Love, Sex, & Soul Mates

quote: Earn Nicely, spend wisely and you will live happily.
author: Auliq Ice

quote: Don't worry about the negative people may say about you. Learn from it and move on.
author: Amanda Penland

quote: Making time to experience joy is the single most important thing you can do to heal your heart.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree
source: The Spiritual Girl's Guide to Dating: Your Enlightened Path to Love, Sex, & Soul Mates

quote: Fiction reveals truths that reality obscures.
author: Jessamyne West

quote: Creativity flows when the mind is light. Be light and ignite your imagination.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: The results of knowledge without application results in nothing at all. Do what you know better to do.
author: DeWayne Owens

quote: Listen within to find shining poetry and hear extraordinary music. You are a work of art.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Everything worth knowing about the 1980s I learned from obsessively reading Bloom County collections when I was nine and Derek Jarman's diaries when I was twenty.
author: Ruadhán J. McElroy

quote: In an age when mass pleasures like television are becoming more feeble and homogeneous, the very act of discrimination becomes a form of protest. At a time when mass marketing of food produces a product so disgusting that it has to be wrapped in distracting gimmicks to be sold, the mere fact of paying attention to what you eat and drink and telling the truth about taste is a revolutionary act.
author: Lynn Hoffman

quote: [Christ] will come again. But we must look to Scripture, not human thought, for our guide to preparing.
author: David Jeremiah
source: Until Christ Returns: Living Faithfully Today While We Wait for Our Glorious Tomorrow

quote: Amid the thousands of shrill voices screaming for our attention, there is but on Voice we need to hear. The voice of the Lord Jesus Christ.
author: David Jeremiah
source: Until Christ Returns: Living Faithfully Today While We Wait for Our Glorious Tomorrow

quote: [Jesus] not only kept Himself from engaging in evil, He also continually acted in ways that honored and glorified god. He not only continually avoided the negative, He always pursued the positive.
author: David Jeremiah
source: Until Christ Returns: Living Faithfully Today While We Wait for Our Glorious Tomorrow

quote: Not doing harder than doing.
author: Natalie Wright

quote: Each of us has a vulnerability like Edmund's that Satan is eager to exploit. It may be something addictive like drugs or alcohol, or it may be something seemingly harmless and perhaps even good like food, friendship, or work.
author: Discovery House Publishers

quote: A escolha entre livros e pessoas sempre lhe fora fácil. Mil vezes enterrada em palavras do que em sentimentos.
author: Sara Farinha

quote: Afinal de contas há coisas que, por mais que se tente usar uma voz agradável e umas palavras dóceis, são inalteráveis. A verdade é o que é! E há verdades que não podem ser adoçadas.
author: Sara Farinha

quote: Afinal, o que seriam mais umas horas sem a admissão de culpa do homem? Uma gota no oceano.
author: Sara Farinha

quote: Múmias não eram mais assustadoras do que qualquer obra de arte naquele museu. Eram artefactos, coisas mortas, extintas há muito tempo, sem alma e sem sentimentos. Os vivos eram mais aterrorizadores.
author: Sara Farinha

quote: An exercise in unknowing is not the same as not knowing or forgetting.
author: Jarod Kintz
source: This is the best book I've ever written, and it still sucks

quote: Enjoy every day and make each day great
author: Ron Law

quote: The creative mind seeks chance and accident while everyone else seeks control and order. Rod Judkins ‘Change Your Mind
author: Rod Judkins
source: Change Your Mind: 57 Ways to Unlock Your Creative Self

quote: Having the best doesn't make you the best but producing the best makes you the best
author: ejembi louis

quote: Kenangi yang lalu, hadapi yang baru dengan penuh kesyukuran.
author: Iman Mka

quote: True success cannot be achieved until you have experienced failure
author: Brian A. Leslie

quote: Ninety percent of everything you believe you can achieve in life you will.
author: Gregory C Dugger

quote: Never worry a bit in Life. Always be full of merriment.
author: sharda sriram

quote: Saya adalah produk gagal yang sedang dalam proses pendauran ulang. :)
author: Boneka Lilin

quote: A Controlled Mind Can Create All That It Words...!
author: Sujit Lalwani

quote: A man is only as rich as the people around him
author: Brian A. Leslie

quote: Loving others is easy, but loving yourself is the true test of real love.
author: Daliah Husu

quote: One day, your light will silence the darkness, and you will be surrounded by the beauty within.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: Sometimes, the most graceful way to handle something is to be decidedly ungraceful.
author: Kristi Ling
source: Operation Happiness: The Three Step Plan to Creating a Life of Lasting Joy, Abundant Energy, and Radical Bliss

quote: Listen with curiosity. Speak with honesty. Act with integrity. The greatest problem with communication is we don’t listen to understand. We listen to reply. When we listen with curiosity, we don’t listen with the intent to reply. We listen for what’s behind the words.

quote: I carry a shower curtain folded up neatly in my wallet, because you never know when you’ll never know.
author: Jarod Kintz
source: A Zebra is the Piano of the Animal Kingdom

quote: At some point in life if you get to a cross road and don't know where to go better figure it out sooner than later, which turn to take.
author: Secli G.

quote: La lectura, asegura, ampliaría mi experiencia del mundo. Las ideas que se encuentran en los libros serios darían profundidad a mis pensamientos sobre cada decisión que tomo.

quote: There's no short-cut in life but with right knowledge, you can fast-track things to come to pass.
author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quote: The world is a different place in this new century, [...]. And we are a different people. My visions still come but no one listens any longer to what they tell us, what they warn us. I knew even as a young woman that destruction bred on the horizon. [...] War touches everyone, and windigos spring from the earth.
author: Joseph Boyden

quote: Cunoștințele sunt cele care se adună în capul nostru fără să ne fie întotdeauna de vreun folos. Cunoașterea e transformarea unor cunoștințe într-o experiență de viață.
author: Jean-Claude Carrière
source: Nu sperați că veți scăpa de cărți

quote: Baxter knows a lot more than I do, I told her.Yes, said Baxter, but I will never tell people all of it.
author: Alasdair Gray

quote: Transform into your dream.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: A necessidade de calor humano leva-nos a procurar companhia nos sítios mais estranhos e, por vezes, nos menos adequados.
author: Sara Farinha

quote: I am reminded that the children we birth do not belong to us. They belong to God. We are simply the vessel through which they arrive on this earth. We are appointed to care for and guide them; however, we must recognize when the time comes for them to govern their own lives.
author: Nancy B. Brewer

quote: you are you when you are true
author: Yasmine Butts

quote: I can do nothing without His help. Oh, Lord, what ignorance thinking everything was wealth.
author: Venus Angelica Perez

quote: Nervousness kill us... because we think we have only one opportunity that is in the Present and we don't think about the future! We loose our balance.
author: Vikram Roy

quote: Como acalmar a fúria, apaziguar a angústia e explicar o inexplicável?
author: Sara Farinha

quote: The Prince is the only option to a better living. His arm is reliable and dependable. Get to Him, stay glued and remain on Top!
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

quote: Here, in this quiet place we own, worlds are born.
author: Cassandra Wilson Run the Voodoo Down

quote: But the main reason you should read this is that I don't see why I should have to know all these terrible, terrible things and you should get off scot free.
author: David Strorm
source: How Animals Have Sex: A Guide to the Reproductive Habits of Creatures Great and Small

quote: Le voile est essentielle pour le monde, soit par l'organisme, ou au moyen de la connaissance
author: AainaA-Ridtz

quote: You believe me wise because I taught you once, but I have not been north, as you have. You have seen (what) I have never seen...You flatter me by asking my opinion.
author: Gene Wolfe

quote: Fear of God is a beginning of knowledge.The fear lessened on a higher knowledge.Walk with God is on the top of knowledge.
author: Toba Beta
source: My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: Wenn [der Lehrer] wirklich weise ist, fordert er euch nicht auf, ins Haus seiner Weisheit einzutreten, sondern führt euch an die Schwelle eures eigenen Geistes.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: Praise be to God I’m not good,And have the natural egotism of flowersAnd rivers following their bedPreoccupied without knowing itOnly with blooming and flowing.This is the only mission in the World,This—to exist clearly,And to know how to do it without thinking about it.)

quote: It's simple, it's not that simple; or life is simple, but the things in it are not. When a man does not understand it, he tends to inflate it. When he does, he tends to deflate it. In the end, neither images are fully accurate.
author: Criss Jami

quote: You don’t know her like I do, because you don’t know her like I don’t. It’s true, I don’t know her at all. What’s she like?
author: Jarod Kintz
source: So many chairs, and no time to sit

quote: Invariably, knowledge dictates life, liberty, and death, but those who have historically occupied the seats of power not only dictate what is defined as knowledge but also dictate what’s included, what’s excluded, and how it is filtered to society vis-à-vis America’s major institutions . . . particularly the educational system; ultimately, shaping the very essence of life.
author: Martin Guevara Urbina
source: Latino Access to Higher Education: Ethnic Realitites and New Directions for the Twenty-first Century

quote: I have a picture of the Pont Neuf on a wall in my apartment, but i know that Paris is really on the closet shelf, in the box next to the sleeping bag, with the rest of my diaries.
author: Thomas Mallon

quote: A matter, as the famous book intoned, of finding the shade of the parachute that best complemented you. But really: With no parachute at all you'd hit the pavement so hard it probably wouldn't even hurt, and you'd unleash a whole new color palate-bone, blood, muscle-in the process.
author: Elisa Albert

quote: There's a very positive relationship between people's ability to accomplish any task and the time they're willing to spend on it.
author: Joyce Brothers

quote: 'Pity without rigor would be cowardly egotism, mere sentimentality.'
author: Matthew Pearl

quote: The truth came to me-a great revelation, showing me that I have a child to the Jones whole and perfect mind, created to express the health that God with.
author: Myrtle Filmore

quote: dont aom for success if u want it just do what u love n believe in and it wil come naturaly.
author: David Frost

quote: When wealth flees, untrue friends follow.
author: Thomas F. Shubnell

quote: The rainbow is the pot of gold to those who observe.
author: Thomas F. Shubnell

quote: Que as nossas palavras ressoem para sempre pela eternidade e que nunca sejam esquecidas. Se por ventura se perderem perdidos estaremos.
author: Rute Canhoto

quote: Our hearts don’t always align with the visions we have for our lives; emotions aren’t always vessels of simple manipulation and, try as we might, we cannot make passionate love exist where it does not.
author: Berry Quotes

quote: berhati-hatilah kalo menghujat para maling dan pelacur. "Because we might do the same.
author: Rama Wibi
source: The Story of L'Arc~en~Ciel - 4 Colours in a Rainbow

quote: I’ve got some questions,Are you sick of feelin’ sorry?And people sayin’ not to worry?Sick of hearing this hakuna matata motto,From people who won the lotto,We’re not that lucky.Have you noticed that you’re breathing?Look around and count your blessings,So when you’re sick of all this stressin’ and guessin’I’m suggestin’ you turn this up and let them hear you sing it
author: Set it off

quote: I do not think he (Chester Arthur) knows anything. He can quote a verse from poetry or a page from Dickens or Thackeray, but these are only leaves springing from a root out of dry ground. His vital forces are not fed,and very soon he has given out his all.
author: Harriet Blaine

quote: Un archeologo è il miglior marito che una donna possa avere: più lei diventa vecchia, più lui s'interessa a lei.
author: Agatha Christie

quote: My eyes kept skipping back to her, drawn to her face like a lone candle flame in the dark
author: Alexandra Bracken

quote: Time stood still so she learnt to alter her focus.
author: Nikki Rowe

quote: If you want to move on, you actually have to make the decision to move on. It won't happen automatically. You have to say, "I deserve better than this and no longer am I going to let this get the better of me", and then take the necessary action to move on with your life.
author: Karon Waddell

quote: From Got Luck --"Tell me why we’re doing this again?” Erin asked.“Remember what we learned from Return of the Jedi?”“No. What?”“We learned you can be the most powerful sorcerer in the galaxy but if someone grabs you and throws you down an energy shaft, you die like everybody else.
author: Michael Darling

quote: Tension is who you think you should be. Relaxation is who you are.
author: Unknown

quote: Só a quero porque não a posso ter.Como um rapaz imberbe
author: Madeline Hunter

quote: At the end to death I must go,Finishing a real tragic and funny show.
author: Mohit K. Misra

quote: Even corpses had purpose, or could be given one. A man could make himself an island his entire life, only to have reason itself laid about him, a fabricated existence. Identity became relative, history nonexistent. As they said, dead men told no tales.
author: Chris Galford

quote: A guidance counselor who has made a fetish of security, or who has unwittingly surrendered his thinking to economic determinism, may steer a youth away from his dream of becoming a poet, an artist, a musician or any other of thousands of things, because it offers no security, it does not pay well, there are no vacancies, it has no "future".
author: Henry M. Wriston

quote: Education is what remains when we have forgotten all that we have been taught.
author: George Savile

quote: But little Carlos's most important defense was not his good punch but rather the beginnings of a great education.
author: Gina Capaldi
source: A Boy Named Beckoning: The True Story of Dr. Carlos Montezuma, Native American Hero

quote: Everything interested him and everything excited him.
author: Barbara W. Tuchman
source: The Proud Tower: A Portrait of the World Before the War, 1890-1914

quote: High school will probably be better. I mean, some kids will still be jerks, but it's not so bad if you have at least one good friend. Someone who gets you.
author: Robin Stevenson

quote: Correct teaching brings out human excellence.
author: Idries Shah
source: Learning How to Learn: Psychology and Spirituality in the Sufi Way

quote: Traps!"he said. "Never in the world! Don't think it! Why, Gower is just a necessary olf bore. Nobody's supposed to know much about him--except instructors and their hapless students.
author: Henry Blake Fuller

quote: People differ to such a degree they agree on nothing,Except death that is, and even on that they disagree.Some say the soul goes on after the death of the bodyWhile others claim the soul, with the body, dies too.
author: Mutannabi

quote: Christ is the Lesson as well as the Teacher.
author: Darvin Pruitt

quote: (Cedric Price produced the Potteries Thinkbelt) ...project which questioned most of the cherished establishment premises of university education and substituted in their place their complete inversion.
author: Roy Landau

quote: Education, boy, is not something to prepare you for life. That is a vulgar American error.… It's something to take you out of life.
author: John Horne Burns

quote: I lack formal education. So I'm left with the feeling that I'm smarter than everyone around me but that if I ever got around really smart people—people who went to universities and drank wine and spoke Latin—that they’d be bored as hell by me. It’s a lonely way to go through life.
author: Gillian Flynn

quote: Education has multiple purposes, but learning how to ask essential questions and how to challenge dogma,tradition, and injustice in appropriate and constructive ways is its highest purposes.
author: Gregory S. Prince

quote: Meditation, education and beauty are the three transforming powers that can change individual and the whole world.
author: Amit Ray

quote: Man was created to glorify God. Now, that may encompass other things which God has planned for each man, but essentially, man was created to glorify God.
author: Criss Jami

quote: The petty man wants to use God for himself; the ambitious man wants God to use him for God.
author: Criss Jami

quote: Success is Never Ending, Failure Is Never Final.
author: Robert A. Schuller

quote: Nothing is impossible, Everything should be possible when we trying for achieve the goal
author: Sanjeev Murukan

quote: Result of HARDWORK Is Neither Friends Nor Enemy,To the AGE Of the ACHIEVER!
author: Sujit Lalwani

quote: Be as successful as a Smith.
author: Gregory C Dugger

quote: If you work hard, and become successful, it does not necessarily mean you are successful because you worked hard, just as if you are tall with long hair it doesn't mean that you would be a midget if you were bald.
author: Lemony Snicket

quote: I shall not dwell in the past...I shall not dread the present...I shall not fear the Future...For as Long as I live...I shall only think of success.
author: Oscar Trejo Jr.

quote: We must thank to all the failed people in the history as they showed us the true way to success!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: They weren't hours, these classes; they weren't even forty-five minutes--they were "periods,"which sounded to me as if they were each at once a little era and then the end you had to see decisively put to it.
author: Gary Lutz

quote: Die Einsicht eines Menschen verleiht ihre Flügel keinem anderen.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: Still reading but learning a lot about true education and the process of guiding our children in their educational pursuits.
author: Oliver DeMille

quote: Dans les sociétés vernaculaires, l'éducation est homéotélique vis-à-vis de Gaïa
author: Edouard Goldsmith

quote: Daring to make a difference in today's youth-one page at a time
author: william sawyers

quote: Sine doctrina vita est quasi mortis imago"[Without learning, life is but the image of death]
author: Dionysius Cato

quote: Each life involves an essential errand; not simply the task of survival, but a life-mission embedded in the soul from the beginning.
author: Michael Meade

quote: Success is suffocating. The air is thinner at the top.
author: Jarod Kintz

quote: I go to sleep in my business suit, because it makes my dreams of success seem more real.
author: Jarod Kintz

quote: In order to live a fulfilled life, do not focus on the size of your audience; focus instead on leaving an impact on the circle of influence God has given you.
author: Rosette Mugidde Wamambe

quote: The general aim of third-party mind programming is: manipulation of beliefs and affiliations, an increase in dependency and subsequent diminishment of autonomy.
author: Joseph Rain

quote: Along every step on our journey through life, our mind is being programmed. If we are not programming it ourselves, someone else is doing it to us.
author: Joseph Rain

quote: Stand up for your conscience. Use light to reveal what is concealed in the darkness. Use truth to fight the lies, and the heart to fight the mind.
author: Suzy Kassem
source: Rise Up and Salute the Sun: The Writings of Suzy Kassem

quote: I felt a Cleaving in my Mind—As if my Brain had split—I tried to match it—Seam by Seam—But could not make it fit.The thought behind, I strove to joinUnto the thought before—But Sequence ravelled out of SoundLike Balls—upon a Floor.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: your right standing with God and your connection to Him remains your strongest defense in the day of calamity.
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

quote: Set out time to worship God in your closet, give Him quality praise and watch Him raise you.
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

quote: On the road to success, even little stones may cause you fall down! If you are not serious and careful, forget about reaching your target!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Whatever we may say about the soul going to the sky... we know there is no sky but only an atmosphere.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: When indeed you positively press your face, so to speak, against the crystalline window of your eyes, your mind is apt to become a perfect vacuum.("Out Of The Deep")
author: Walter de la Mare
source: Great Tales of Terror and the Supernatural

quote: Though the ancient poet in Plutarch tells us we must not trouble the gods with our affairs because they take no heed of our angers and disputes, we can never enough decry the disorderly sallies of our minds.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Some people have a heart to do evil and they don’t care if you’re Muslim or Christian.
author: Tucker Elliot

quote: Although any help is genuinely welcomed, it is more important to be a supportive, proactive parent than it is to be a supportive parent after academic failure and negative behaviors occur.
author: Tanya R. Liverman
source: Memoirs of an Educarer: An Inspiration for Education

quote: Unexamined wallpaper is classroom practices and institutional policies that are so entrenched in school culture or a teacher's paradigm that their ability to affect student learning is never probed.
author: Richard Elmore

quote: An educator will teach the students. An Educarer will reach the students.
author: Tanya R. Liverman
source: Memoirs of an Educarer: An Inspiration for Education

quote: We will continue to chase rainbows unless we recognize that they are rainbows and there is no pot of gold at the end of them.
author: Diane Ravitch

quote: College is the grinding machine of the Mathematical Establishment, a conveyor belt that takes individuals from one cookie cutter to another so that the product comes within tight control limits out of the assembly line.
author: Bill Gaede

quote: Equality, citizens, is not the whole of society on a level, a society of tall blades of grass and small oaks, or a number of entangled jealousies. It is, legally speaking, every aptitude having the same opportunity for a career; politically all consciences having the same right. Equality has an organ, gratuitous and compulsory education. We must begin with the right to the alphabet.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Karena kita tidak abadi, namun tulisan kita bisa abadi
author: Maria Magdalena

quote: If "facts"convinced people of things, no one would have sex
author: Glenn Hefley

quote: To be ignorant is to waste the talents you were born with. To be ignorant is to confine your life to a path no different than the generations before you
author: Linda Cardillo

quote: Sesuatu yang tidak pernah dilihat bukan berrati tidak ada dan tidak nyata
author: rahmahasyiah

quote: Entering a cell, penetrating deep as a flying saucer to find a new galaxy would be an honorable task for a new scientist interested more in the inner state of the soul than in outer space.
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: Like most arts, the link between the mind and the pen can chain you like an enslaved workaholic. Even on an intended vacation you suddenly have this killer urge to record whatever the vacation may teach.
author: Criss Jami

quote: The steady soul and the ego pretender / walk with their arms round each other's shoulders / through the mirage.
author: Jay Woodman

quote: Everything in life had a purpose, and unless it achieved that purpose, it was just taking up space on the planet and wasting everybody's time.
author: Jeannette Walls

quote: What a person has is of no consequence, whether much or little, when it comes to the deep satisfaction of the soul. Apart from Christ, the rich and beautiful, and the poor and unlovely, will all end up in precisely the same misery.
author: Kelly Minter
source: No Other gods: Confronting Our Modern Day Idols

quote: But that did not stop her heart from shattering into countless pieces or her soul from shredding into slivers.
author: Farrah Naseem

quote: The sole/soul purpose of a book is to be read.
author: Dani J. Caile

quote: Body needs variable of time to be able to settle presence of soul in this three-dimensional space.
author: Toba Beta
source: My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: The essence of all things determines souls that are fit to send messages for their kinds.
author: Toba Beta
source: My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: And at that moment, Thibaut knew he was a murderer. He had murdered his brother that night; he had taken away his brother's soul.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: The devil can be a clown of prizes in moments like these. Moments of knowing you’ve ventured too far down the wrong path and all you can do is accept more prizes ...
author: J.M. August

quote: Life is a journey worth making.
author: Pandora Gray

quote: Failure are given power, not success ..
author: David S. Mark

quote: Because I keep it real and reality is a ruthless bitch. Plus I wanna make money – you cool with that?” - Gable
author: J.M. August

quote: We are in the process of disabling our most distinctive achievement - our educational system - in the name of making the country more like itself.
author: Marilynne Robinson

quote: Shifting the frame only slightly, the choice of a theory from among the range of always ideologically founded theories is itself necessarily ideologically motivated. Positioning is unavoidable; positioning is the result of choice from among a range of possibilities; that choice is socially meaningful - it is ideological.
author: Gunther Kress
source: Multimodality: A Social Semiotic Approach to Contemporary Communication: Exploring Contemporary Methods of Communication

quote: You solely owe success and happiness to yourself. So why not make your inner-self proud of your daily decisions and actions?
author: Edmond Mbiaka

quote: It is literally true that you can succeed best and quickest by helping others to succeed.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Success breeds slackery. And I breed in the backery of the bakery.
author: Jarod Kintz
source: Whenever You're Gone, I'm Here For You

quote: A veiled Mind is more enticing than all the nude men lining up the Seine, during Summer.
author: AainaA-Ridtz

quote: The limited mind owned by human..requires billions of brains of many generations,before capable enough to understand the truth, the kind of truth which will set us free.
author: Toba Beta
source: My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: a group of people who individually can do nothing but as a group decide that nothing can be done
author: Fred Allen

quote: A solid idea is a firm foundation of a universe construction.
author: Toba Beta
source: My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut

quote: Being human trespass the conditionings of the laws of the worlds that have been created by the conditioned society — these reflective of a conditioned mind reflect the facets of the self, to discipline and educate indirectly; restrict evolution for pardon, and affliction
author: AainaA-Ridtz

quote: Every time I go to sleep, I know I may never wake up. How could anyone expect to? You drop your tiny, helpless mind into a bottomless well, crossing your fingers and hoping that when you pull it out on its flimsy fishing wire it hasn't been gnawed to bones by the beasts below. Hoping you pull up anything at all.
author: Isaac Marion

quote: Being poor in the Spirit means you are humble, gentle, meek, God-fearing,kind and exhibit the fruits of the Spirit but being Spiritually poor is lacking in every thing that pertains to life and godliness.
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

quote: He would never again need anything from his mother and father but their love.
author: Frederick Drimmer
source: Born Different: Amazing Stories of Very Special People

quote: When the Prince comes into your life, you will stop thinking and start reasoning.
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

quote: Nakamura Tempu Sensei viewed the mind as a segment of the body that could not be seen and the body as the element of the mind that was observable. He also likened the mind and body to a stream, with the mind as the source flowing down to the body. Whatever we drop in the stream will be carried down by the current. In like manner, our thoughts will influence the body and our well being.
author: H.E. Davey

quote: Memoria - fie memoria individuală, fie memoria colectivă care este cultura - are o dublă funcție. Una, într-adevăr, e să conserve anumite date, cealaltă să cufunde în uitare informațiile ce nu ne folosesc și care ne-ar putea încărca inutil mințile.
author: Jean-Claude Carrière
source: Nu sperați că veți scăpa de cărți

quote: Living threads more numerous than stars frame the universe of my mind.
author: Daniel P. Kimble

quote: On the road to success some will always expect tragedy ... ditch your doubts and experience success with Cosmic Ordering.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: A man may fail many times, and then he turns to Cosmic Ordering.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: Failure is a steppingstone to poverty, Cosmic Ordering is an elevator to success.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: The key to failure is ignoring Cosmic Ordering.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: You can forget trying to climb the success ladder, all you will ever need in life is brought to you in the Cosmic Ordering elevator.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: Don’t wait for success, use Cosmic Ordering.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: Believe and achieve with Cosmic Ordering.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: The fastest way to double your money is to use Cosmic Ordering.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: Lessen the odds are stacked against you, Use Cosmic Ordering.
author: Stephen Richards

quote: Tests were always easy for me. I saw them as games, saw myself as being in a contest against a mythical adversary, and welcomed the challenge.
author: Walter Dean Myers

quote: You need to cleanse your mind throughout life because there is so much negativity in yourself and around. Keep cleaning and you will connect with the Universe quicker and effectively.
author: Hina Hashmi
source: Your Life A Practical Guide to Happiness Peace and Fulfilment

quote: Alfvén dismissed in his address religion as a 'myth'...
author: Helge Kragh
source: Matter and Spirit in the Universe: Scientific and Religious Preludes to Modern Cosmology

quote: The joy from eating does not come from the exclusivity of the food, but instead from the sensitivity that we eat it with.
author: Nino Gruettke
source: BOTH of You: Behavior. Opinion. Thinking. Happiness - The more rational we are, the more emotional we can be.

quote: I don't think it's a Western thing to really talk about intrinsic motivation and the drive for autonomy, mastery and purpose. You have to not be struggling for survival. For people who don't know where their next meal is coming, notions of finding inner motivation are comical.
author: Daniel H. Pink

quote: If you look to lead, invest at least 40% of your time managing yourself - your ethics, character, principles, purpose, motivation, and conduct. Invest at least 30% managing those with authority over you, and 15% managing your peers.
author: Dee Hock

quote: I love my stories being multi-layered, and coming at it from different angles, so that you don't understand the film's true emotional motivation until the very end.
author: M. Night Shyamalan

quote: Enthusiasm moves the world.
author: Arthur Balfour

quote: The Wright brothers flew right through the smoke screen of impossibility.
author: Charles Kettering

quote: Be brave enough to live life creatively. The creative place where no one else has ever been.
author: Alan Alda

quote: If you have one true friend you have more than your share.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Life has no blessing like a prudent friend.
author: Euripides

quote: It seems to me that trying to live without friends is like milking a bear to get cream for your morning coffee. It is a whole lot of trouble, and then not worth much after you get it.
author: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: I bear a charmed life.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Life is far too important a thing ever to talk seriously about.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: The quality, not the longevity, of one's life is what is important.
author: Martin Luther King

quote: Every year we celebrate the holy season of Advent, O God. Every year we pray those beautiful prayers of longing and waiting, and sing those lovely songs of hope and promise.
author: Karl Rahner

quote: Feelings aroused by the touch of someone's hand, the sound of music, the smell of a flower, a beautiful sunset, a work of art, love, laughter, hope and faith - all work on both the unconscious and the conscious aspects of the self, and they have physiological consequences as well.
author: Bernie Siegel

quote: Hope is the anchor of our souls. I know of no one who is not in need of hope - young or old, strong or weak, rich or poor.
author: James E. Faust

quote: Your words are my food, your breath my wine. You are everything to me.
author: Sarah Bernhardt

quote: With our love, we could save the world.
author: George Harrison

quote: He is not a lover who does not love forever.
author: Euripides

quote: I especially love all the instruments of art: inks, pens, paintbrushes, watercolors and oils, fine papers and canvases, and although I love to mess around with these tools and objects, I have minimal artistic skills.
author: Sharon Creech

quote: Art is the tree of life. Science is the tree of death.
author: William Blake

quote: Diplomacy, n. is the art of letting somebody else have your way.
author: David Frost

quote: I've thought a lot about success, because it's very strange to me that I've been successful.
author: Steve Carell

quote: For success, the author must make the reader care about the destiny of the principals, and sustain this anxiety, or suspense, for about 100,000 words.
author: Ken Follett

quote: Nearly all monster stories depend for their success on Jack killing the Giant, Beowulf or St. George slaying the Dragon, Harry Potter triumphing over the basilisk. That is their inner grammar, and the whole shape of the story leads towards it.
author: A. N. Wilson

quote: If you're that hypersensitive about color and don't have a sense of humor, don't marry out of your race.
author: Laura Schlessinger

quote: There's a charm, there's a rhythm, there's a soul to Jewish humor. When I first saw Richard Pryor perform, I told him, 'You're doing a Jewish act.'
author: Alan King

quote: Mixing humor and politics is something that works.
author: Bryan Cranston

quote: Your past karma is what you found difficult or challenging in this life. To heal your past karma you would need to learn your life lessons for this life.
author: Avis J. Williams

quote: I can always choose, but I ought to know that if I do not choose, I am still choosing.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: Existentialism's first move is to make every man aware of what he is and to make the full responsibility of his existence rest on him.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: [E]very man ought to say to himself, "Am I really the kind of man who has the right to act in such a way that humanity might guide itself by my actions?
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: Success is not an activity but a process.
author: De philosopher Dj Kyos

quote: There is one invisible bridge for every one of us and death is the first step of it. On this side, there is life where there are questions and fear but on that other side of that bridge, there is a whole new world full of answers and peace.
author: Viraj J. Mahajan

quote: Your true friends echo your own philosophies back at you.
author: J.R. Rim

quote: Sometimes you wish the world would be a better place and sometimes you wish the world was a better place. Only the great understanding of the difference of the time between the past and present moment will make it a better place.
author: Jammy Creamer

quote: the pursuit of love is like falconry.- chronicle of death foretold
author: Gabriel Garcí­a Márquez

quote: To respect a mystery is to make way for the answer.
author: Criss Jami

quote: Biggest mistake that people make is. That they forget that there is always next time. For any event, any situation and any circumstances.
author: De philosopher Dj Kyos

quote: I will try it until i get it right. I will try it until i am no longer trying but doing it.
author: De philosopher Dj Kyos

quote: I find people with depression are like a broken clocks, and clock maker after clock maker will try to fix you, but sometimes time itself is the answer.
author: isaac andrews

quote: A family man shouldn't trade his peace for profits, it is the job of a businessman.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: ...engaging with a work of ancient philosophy can be a two-way street; bringing it into a discussion can enrich that discussion, which also encouraging us to see the work in light of that discussion.
author: Julia Annas

quote: Wonderment shared is doubled.Love shared is infinite.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: The greatest lesson we should learn is that from the moment we are born we already have everything we need within ourselves.
author: George Pornaris

quote: When you don't fit in anymore, eat less.
author: Benny Bellamacina

quote: Nation needs soldiers, politics needs civilians.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Knowledge was scattered treasure, education organized it into art, commerce and science.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Here was enough transcendentalism to drive even a cave-dwelling Tibetan holy man insane. Jack Sawyer was everywhere; Jack Sawyer was everything.
author: Stephen King Peter Straub

quote: We are the local embodiment of a Cosmos grown to self-awareness. We have begun to contemplate our origins: starstuff pondering the stars; organized assemblages of ten billion billion billion atoms considering the evolution of atoms; tracing the long journey by which, here at least, consciousness arose.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: It is with this movement, with the passage and dissolution of impressions, images, sensations, that analysis leaves off—that continual vanishing away, that strange, perpetual weaving and unweaving of ourselves.
author: Walter Pater
source: The Renaissance: Studies in Art and Poetry

quote: Closed eyes cannot see the light
author: Andrea L'Artiste

quote: Eventually we all get tired of any and everything!
author: honeya

quote: Do not look for my heart any more; the beasts have eaten it.
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: It is a bitter thought, how different a thing the Christianity of the world might have been, if the Christian faith had been adopted as the religion of the empire under the auspices of Marcus Aurelius instead of those of Constantine.
author: John Stuart Mill

quote: Indulge your passion for science…but let your science be human, and such as may have a direct reference to action and society. Be a philosopher; but amidst all your philosophy, be still a man.
author: David Hume

quote: When someone uses Philosophy as an indispensable tool for tackling Theology and knows no other way for approaching that scripture-related Science, then you must have already figured out by now that he is a gentile who is standing right before you.
author: Ibrahim Ibrahim

quote: Follow your heart. It will lead you to where you need to be.
author: Avis J. Williams

quote: Failures and mistakes are lessons to be learned from. They are opportunities for growth.
author: Avis J. Williams

quote: We are all teachers, we all have knowledge and experiences that can teach others.
author: Avis J. Williams

quote: If your doctrine changed for the better yet your character changed for the worse, you changed for the worse.
author: Criss Jami

quote: We must not allow our pride to be the motivation behind our apologetics; rather, philoverity, the love of truth must be the full and complete motivation. For pride corrupts truth.
author: Criss Jami

quote: Happiness is not something you pursue, it is a state of mind and a feeling of positivity, within.
author: Amitav Chowdhury

quote: Your success should create a path that inspires others to follow.
author: Amitav Chowdhury

quote: Body is slave of mind. Mind is regulated by ideas, attitudes, beliefs and tendencies. What really matters is that which set of beliefs get most well entrenched in the mind of a person in the first few decades of his life so as to guide him for the rest of his life as he starts his journey from one end of life to another end of life.
author: Shri Nagesh

quote: A netizen speaks normally about one’s life’s first priority or preference through the profile picture; it’s often the person seen therein, but it could also be the product on which s/he lays the hand on or seen as an inset in this selfish and materialistic world.
author: Anuj Somany

quote: Das Bedürfnis, Leiden beredt werden zu lassen, ist Bedingung aller Wahrheit.(The need to lend a voice to suffering [literally: "to let suffering be eloquent"] is the condition of all truth)
author: Theodor W. Adorno

quote: You must go on.I can’t go on.I’ll go on.
author: Samuel Beckett

quote: This only is denied to God: the power to undo the past.
author: Agathon

quote: I know how men in exile feed on dreams of hope.
author: Aeschyulus

quote: Hope is like a word made with cloud, without faith, it quickly blows away.
author: Anthony Liccione

quote: To shine always love always.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Loud critics are silenced by loud success.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Your life is a show and you're the star so don't let anyone walk on set and treat you like an extra.
author: Lucas Mascotto-Carbone

quote: Perform the act of writing as often as possible.
author: Secli G

quote: Jesus Christ has already come to suffer in the hands of men and He shall least entertain anyone who will disturb Him in eternal eternity in the Kingdom of God! If you want to join Him, ponder!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: There shall always be a day and a night until the world meets its ebb and we shall always hope to sleep and wake up to see another day! Such is called life! So many people have life, but, few people are living. We shall continue to exist from dawn to dusk having life and living or just having life!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: First and foremost: a human being. If your definition of yourself is something else; maybe you should reconsider.
author: Berivan Selim

quote: You are all the happiness you ever need”.
author: Abdulazeez Henry Musa

quote: Warriors achieve more than worriers.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: You are the reason of your own good-luck and bad-luck; success and failure; happiness and pain. Your choices are responsible for your present. Don’t blame someone else for your sufferings or failures.
author: Sanjeev Himachali

quote: What you conquer within you conquer without.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Behind your greatest fears lie your greatest rewards.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: Try - now's gift.
author: H.L. Balcomb

quote: The entire life we have has it's real meaning in giving! He who least knows the real value of giving that can leave a distinctive footprint least knows what the essence of life is about
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: When people leave you, identify why they left and think about what is left
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: You are the sum of what you believe. Your capabilities are limitless when you allow yourself to be so.
author: Steven Cuoco

quote: Our daily gratitude shapes our everyday attitude.
author: H.L. Balcomb

quote: Every time you read a book, a tree smiles knowing that there's life after death.
author: Anonymous

quote: Love's core purpose is to always inspire us to become more wholesomely ourselves because of love's experience.
author: H.L. Balcomb

quote: Hope is the light that flickers and burns eternally, when you remain steadfast with faith.
author: Virginia Martin
source: Faith Without Borders: A Devotional to Inspire You to Step Out in Faith.

quote: Change your thoughts, change your world.
author: Martha Beck

quote: for me, to say that I am yet to begin gives me the real reason not to look back and see what I have done but, to look ahead and see, understand and plan for what I am yet to do
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Success is an inner energy only winners can release it.
author: Mohammed Sekouty

quote: The Sewing Machine CharmTo A Life Bound by Family, The Thread That Ties Us All Together
author: Viola Shipman

quote: You do not give your precious body to the billy clubs of Birmingham sheriffs, nor to the insidious activity of the streets.
author: Ta-Nehisi Coates

quote: with my last Breathe,i will hope,for i know my hope is placed in the right place.
author: Jonathan Eriah

quote: The Mustard Seed CharmWith Faith As Small As A Mustard Seed, Then You Can Move Mountains: Nothing Will Be Impossible
author: Viola Shipman

quote: 20 years ago, being called as STORY-TELLER was a TAUNT. Being a good story-teller was equated to ACTORS, DRAMAS, and LIARS etc. But now, being a story-teller is a COMPLEMENT. If you are a good story-teller than you are a good LEADER, you are a good MOTIVATOR and you are a good EDUCATOR. Time has changed.
author: Sanjeev Himachali

quote: for me, to say I yet to begin gives me reasons not to look back and see what I have done but ,to look ahead and see, understand and plan for what I am yet to do
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Until you learn how to confidently say NO to so many things, you shall always say YES to so many things. The real summary of a regretful life is a life that failed to balance YES and NO. Yes! A life that failed to recognize when to courageously say NO and when to confidently say YES!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: It takes true courage and real humility to say NO or YES!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: To Be who you want to Be - Don't Wonder... Just Surrender! -RVM
author: RVM

quote: Beautiful rainbows are formed in ugly storms.
author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quote: In order to be creative rules cannot exist. The creative mind deserves no less.
author: Steven Cuoco

quote: If God is so big He holds the world in His hands, but He also lives in our hearts . . . shouldn't He show through?"- Anonymous wisdom from a child
author: Jason Spade

quote: The Loon CharmTo A Life Filled with A Love Whose Voice Always Calls You Home
author: Viola Shipman

quote: Even at 80, I shall say that I am yet to start, for that shall give me the real reason never ever to look back and see what I have done but to look ahead and see the marvelous things I shall be able to do and the distinctive footprints I shall be able live and leave with the very seconds that shall be ahead of me! Life must never be over until all is over!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Life is INCONCLUSIVE but its about an everlasting FUTURE
author: Delma Pryce
source: ABOVE AND BEYOND: My Spiritual Journey

quote: Even at 80, I shall say that I am yet to start, Yes! I shall say that I am yet to start, for that shall give me the real reason never ever to look back and see what I have done but, to look ahead and see the marvelous things I shall be able to do and the distinctive footprints I shall be able live and leave with the very seconds that shall be ahead of me! Life must never be over until all is over!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Keeping or holding on to a concept shows belief but building or adding to it shows confidence and depth of character.
author: Delma Pryce
source: ABOVE AND BEYOND: My Spiritual Journey

quote: Excuses; the great chains that entangle purposeful life to the pillar of unpurposeful living
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: The Puzzle Piece CharmTo A Life Filled with Friends Who Complete You
author: Viola Shipman

quote: Life isn't always what you expect it to be. Sometimes it hands you lemons and other times sugary sweets. But there are no shortcuts to your dreams. So if one way doesn't lead you to your goal. Find another one.
author: Berivan Selim

quote: People will envy you, cut you down, tell lies and despise you, all the while they're watching you. Let them watch you rise above and succeed. Let go of the negativity and the ill minded. Some people are so blinded.
author: Elizabeth Blade
source: A Rising Moon on Domestic Violence

quote: We are generally treated based on how much or little we have, earn, or know—or seem to have, earn, or know.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: Like roses we are born, we grow and expand, in knowledge and bliss, and when our time is due our bodies return to mother Nature.
author: Joseph Rain

quote: Isn't it a good thing we don't know everything? If we did, we wouldn't have a reason to have curiosity, and curiosity is like imagination, taking us back to the time when we were just children in our own fantasylands.
author: Jule Warner

quote: Sorrow is knowledge: they who know the most must mourn the deepest o’er the fatal truth, the Tree of Knowledge is not that of Life.
author: George Gordon Byron

quote: The tragedy is that there are many walking encyclopedias who are living failures.
author: Shiv Khera
source: You Can Win: A Step by Step Tool for Top Achievers

quote: Acquire knowledge and enjoy its freedom or allow someone to fill you with theirs and live within the jurisdiction of theirs.
author: Ikechukwu Izuakor

quote: Let men be men and let women be women and the world will revolve around its purpose
author: Ikechukwu Izuakor

quote: The Best films are a small amount, some films learn us things which we won't forget, others just show us one of the things which we already know others just lose our time. But which are the best? and Which you will choose?.. Are the best two questions you must ask yourself before you start watching a film!
author: Deyth Banger

quote: By thinking of things you could understand them.
author: James Joyce
source: A Portrait of the Artist as a Young Man

quote: Schools are a fountain of knowledge: some students come to drink , some to sip and others just to gargle.
author: Shiv Khera
source: You Can Win: A Step by Step Tool for Top Achievers

quote: We are drowning in information but starving for knowledge and wisdom. Education ought to teach us not only how to make a living but also how to live.
author: Shiv Khera
source: You Can Win: A Step by Step Tool for Top Achievers

quote: In a time of turbulence and change, it is more true than ever that knowledge is power.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: What comes from experience is knowledge,what comes naturally is wisdom.
author: NITYA MORE

quote: Kashays [anger-pride-deceit-greed] will not leave by suppressing them, they go away through Gnan (Enlightened Knowledge).
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Circumstances can change through worldly knowledge (ignorance of the self, the Soul) and also through (true) knowledge (realization of the self). With ignorance, circumstances will bring entanglements and with (true) knowledge, circumstances will bring solutions. (True) Knowledge itself changes circumstances. Is God likely to come down and do so?
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: If in other sciences we should arrive at certainty without doubt and truth without error, it behooves us to place the foundations of knowledge in mathematics.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: For the things of this world cannot be made known without a knowledge of mathematics.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: HOW CAN YOU KNOW THIS?” the Voice demanded.“I look at things and think about them,” Folly replied. “And use my intuition, of course, and deduction and induction, as well as any historical or theoretical models that seem to apply.
author: Jim Butcher

quote: Some of the most polished ideas are discovered through healthy, honest debate, so if you don't argue with yourself every once in a while, other people will gladly point out that you missed a spot.
author: Criss Jami

quote: I can't be afraid of someone whose human side I see and know.
author: Cecelia Ahern

quote: Just do what you were going to do, before you said you were going to do it.
author: Delma Pryce
source: ABOVE AND BEYOND: My Spiritual Journey

quote: The spirit and soul are the body and brain, which are destructible-that is precisely why they are so precious.
author: Ta-Nehisi Coates

quote: All those that don’t allow us to do things for the Soul (our True Self), they are our opposers (kashays); we shouldn’t listen to them.

quote: Until ignorance, of one’s own Self (the Soul), is removed, illusory attachment (moha) will not go away.

quote: But being the mirrors for each other's souls has a cost: by the time they part from each other, the individuals in the mating pair have become indistinguishable. Before their merger, they each yearned for the other; as they part, they part from the self. The very quality that attracted them to each other is also, inevitably, destroyed in their union.

source: The Paper Menagerie and Other Stories

quote: Pure Soul and circumstances; there are only these two; but the disturbance of egoism does not allow it to be at peace.

quote: There are so many things in this world. If we put it in short (succinctly), then what will remain? The ‘pure Soul’ and ‘circumstances’. Moreover, to disperse is the nature of circumstances. Therefore, the Pure Soul will not have to tell them to go away.

quote: Abhorrence towards bitter circumstances and attachment towards sweet ones is the nature of agnan (ignorance of the self). Bitter and sweet will not exist if agnan (ignorance of the self) leaves.

quote: Attachment-abhorrence is an ‘effect’ and ignorance (of the self) is the ‘cause’!

quote: Awareness (of the Self) prevails in matters where one becomes attachment-free (vitrag), and where one has attachment-abhorrence, there his awareness will not prevail.

quote: Is it bravery or stupidity? Education can decipher?
author: Gladys Adevey

quote: My heart was burning for home. For a moment I felt like crying out, but at the moment of greater pain my mother's voice came back to me. It was as if she was here and talking, Stay and take an education, boy. Take it in, That's the main thing.
author: Michael Anthony

quote: Getting rid of poverty is not about making the rich more aware: it’s about educating the poor and empowering them from within.
author: Joseph Rain

quote: She was torn between her customer service training and her youthful certitude.
author: Bill Bryson

quote: Read a good book every day. Books help to educate the soul. The mere joy of learning something new will instill the will to live in you.
author: Sanchita Pandey

quote: Life in itself is a big classroom - so learn all the chapters of life well. This chapter of illness is but only one chapter. Learn whatever it has come to teach you and move on in life.
author: Sanchita Pandey

quote: He was one of those young men who possess an impressive store of facts, but no truths.
author: John Howard Griffin

quote: The Mother Thing makes our world.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: More depended on the student than on the school.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: When you read about chemistry and physics, you want to do them too.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: College was at the heart of his sentimental imagination.
author: Rick Perlstein
source: The Invisible Bridge: The Fall of Nixon and the Rise of Reagan

quote: Yusufu alikuwa hohehahe kabla na baada ya kuuzwa na nduguze kama mtumwa nchini Misri. Hakuwa na pesa, hakuwa na elimu, hakujuana na viongozi wa serikali. Lakini kwa vile alikuwa na Mungu, Mungu alimbariki mpaka watu wote wakashangaa. Yusufu alikuwa maskini ili mimi na wewe tuwe na tumaini leo, kwamba tukiwa na Mungu katika maisha yetu hatutatafuta utajiri. Utajiri ndiyo utakaotutafuta sisi.
author: Enock Maregesi

quote: Nobody in Colonial America, to be sure, believed that society owed every child the ultimate in education, but intelligence, industry, and thrift combined with ambition got many a poor man's son into the colonial colleges.
author: Louis B. Wright

quote: There were also the Masters of Arcane Knowledge. Everyone begrudged their presence among the gifteds. These were the kids that could break down an engine and build it back again - no diagrams or instructions needed. They understood things in a real, not theoretical, way. They seemed not to care about their grades.
author: Alice Sebold

quote: ...talent is evenly distributed. You never know how many talented people are out there until you invite and inspire them to be creative.
author: John Wood
source: Creating Room to Read: A Story of Hope in the Battle for Global Literacy

quote: If someone would have talked in school about safe touch and unsafe touch, I believe I would have spoken up as a child and not been victimized over and over again for years, but that day never came, which is why my mission now is to protect children from the childhood I could not be protected from.
author: Erin Merryn
source: An Unimaginable Act: Overcoming and Preventing Child Abuse Through Erin's Law

quote: If it's really education you want for Nathan,' Buell said, 'have him read the papers, so he'll know what's going on in the world, and why. Teach him to be interested in everything he doesn't understand - interested enough to find out about it from books or people that aren't afraid to tell the truth.
author: Kenneth Roberts

quote: Your education is important because with only a few words you can show an employer the depth of your potential.
author: Matthew T. Cross
source: The Resume Design Book: How to Write a Resume in College & Influence Employers to Hire You

quote: Francie, huddled with other children of her kind, learned more that first day than she realized. She learned of the class system of a great Democracy.
author: Betty Smith

quote: She saw why teachers get very old and stay very young. For there is no closer probing of the mind--not even in psychoanalysis.
author: John Horne Burns

quote: If he could not restore her to the status of a respectable woman, then Sohrab would make her into something else entirely, something hitherto unknown in their entire extended family, an educated woman, a professional woman.
author: Jasmin Darznik
source: The Good Daughter: A Memoir of My Mother's Hidden Life

quote: He knew instinctively the cardinal function of a teacher – which is a stout lever to raw mass.
author: John Horne Burns

quote: If you're independent-minded in school, you're probably going to get in trouble very early on. That's not the trait that's being preferred or cultivated.
author: Noam Chomsky
source: Class Warfare: Interviews with David Barsamian

quote: The real education is when you awaken and nourish and guide the inner spirit, this inner genius. The community grows from the giving of the gifts of the people in it, which is really giving from the genius.
author: Michael Meade

quote: A long list of propositions does not necessarily make a coherent argument
author: Andrew Pettegree
source: Brand Luther: How an Unheralded Monk Turned His Small Town into a Center of Publishing, Made Himself the Most Famous Man in Europe—and Started the Protestant Reformation

quote: If each of us could help one orphan to build his/her capacity, and academic background rather than giving them money or food, then no family will sufferer without guardian.
author: Sbr Khan

quote: Narrative understanding is a large part of the ability to connect with, understand, and have compassion for all of us engaged in learning more about being human.
author: Leah C. Fowler

quote: Preparing citizens to act thoughtfully to create a more just, open, and creative society gives form, substance and meaning to often abstract concepts of freedom and democracy.
author: Gregory S. Prince
source: Jr.,  Teach Them To Challenge Authority: Educating for healthy societies

quote: I had not expected the gentle, tentative surge of gratitude I began to feel...for St. Paul's School, the spring, and the early morning. I needed the morning light and the warbling birds. I needed to find a way to live in this place for a moment and get the good of it. I had tried to hold myself apart, and the aloneness proved more terrible than what I had tried to escape.
author: Lorene Cary
